patterns: can i get guest house details?
responses:
VIT guest house:

This is an elegant building which has 11 furnished rooms.

All rooms are equipped with luxurious wood furniture and modern amenities for comfort and are individually air-conditioned.

Cable television with satellite programs is provided in all rooms.

Hot and cold water facilities in the bathrooms, comfortable mattresses and cosy pillows are standard amenities in all rooms.

Internet facilities are provided in the rooms.

patterns: What is the attendance eligibity criteria?
Minimum attendance required to attend CAT exams
How much attendance should I have to take up CAT and FAT exams?
responses:
These are the Minimum Attendance Eligibility Criteria:

CAT-1 (Continuous Assessment Test 1)

From the date of registration into the course to one day before the start of CAT-1 exams
Minimum percentage of Attendance Required - 75%

CAT-2 (Continuous Assessment 2)
From the date of registration into the course to one day before the start of CAT-2 exams
Minimum percentage of Attendance Required - 75%

FAT theory or lab exams
From the date of registration into the course to the last instructional day
Minimum percentage of Attendance Required - 75%
